name: Thyroid_stimulatingHormoneTSHQuantitativeTestsInSerumOrPlasmaByAnyMethod
title: Thyroid_stimulating hormone (TSH) [Quantitative] (Tests in serum or plasma by any method)
purpose: (Clinical Focus: This set of values contains codes for laboratory test names associated with detecting the presence of Thyroid-stimulating hormone (TSH) in serum or plasma by any method),(Data Element Scope: Laboratory tests names that were ordered or observed.),(Inclusion Criteria: component: thyrotropin; LOINC search: TSH System:Ser),(Exclusion Criteria: None)
